name: 2023 8th International Conference on Water Pollution and Treatment
content: PUBLICATION: Accepted and published papers can be published in Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264), which is indexed by Scopus (Since 2019) and included in the Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, ProQuest.
